Multiple news organizations: including News18 Urdu, Aaj Tak, and Jansatta, initially reported that a Muslim youth was assaulted in a Mangaluru mall by members of the Sangh parivar, asserting that India is a Hindu rashtra.
The video of the incident: which showed a man being assaulted, was widely shared on social media, further adding to the claim's authenticity.
The victim himself can be heard in the v: Hindu Rashtra', supporting the claim made by the news organizations.
The police arrested individuals: including Moideen Safwan, Abdul Rahim Saad, and one minor, who were allegedly involved in the assault and belonged to a city-based college, as reported by The News Minute and News18.
